description: A huge fire broke out in the waste dump near the main market. Thick black smoke is everywhere, people are choking!
There is a massive pothole in the middle of MG Road causing traffic jams and accidents. A biker fell just now.
Streetlight on 5th avenue has been flickering for a week. It's annoying but not dangerous yet.
Garbage has not been collected for 3 days in Sector 4. The smell is getting bad.
Water pipe burst on the main street, flooding the entire road. Cars are stuck.
Stray dogs are chasing children near the primary school. Very dangerous situation.
Construction material dumped on the sidewalk blocking pedestrian path.
Illegal parking in front of the hospital gate. Ambulance cannot enter!
Graffiti painted on the statue in the park.
Manhole cover is missing near the playground. A child could fall in.
Traffic signal at the busy intersection is not working. Chaos and near misses.
Abandoned car parked on the roadside for months. It's rusting.
Public toilet in the market is overflowing and unusable.
Tree branch about to fall on the power lines. Sparks seen.
Wheelchair ramp at the government office is broken.
Loud music playing late at night from the nearby club. Can't sleep.
Dead animal on the road causing foul smell.
Open drainage causing mosquito breeding. Health hazard.
Someone is burning plastic in the open field. Toxic smoke.
Bus stop shelter has collapsed. No shade for commuters.
Electric wires hanging low over the street. Danger of electrocution.
Garbage truck spilling waste on the road while driving.
Park benches are broken and unsafe to sit on.
Street sign for 'No Entry' is faded and unreadable.
Large crowd gathering without masks, violating health protocols.
Water leakage in the apartment basement affecting structural integrity.
Blocked drainage causing localized flooding after rain.
Stray cattle blocking the highway. Traffic halted.
Unauthorized billboard installed blocking the traffic light view.
Broken glass on the playground slide. Kids could get cut.
Severe pothole causing damage to vehicles near the highway exit.
Overflowing dustbin attracting rats and flies.
Streetlight pole is leaning dangerously.
Construction debris left on the road causing accidents.
Smoke coming from the underground transformer.
Illegal dumping of chemicals in the river.
Noise from construction work at night disturbing residents.
Broken sidewalk tiles causing tripping hazard for elderly.
Tree roots uplifting the pavement.
Speed breaker is too high and unmarked, damaging cars.
Waterlogging in the underpass preventing passage.
Rabid dog biting people in the park.
Gas leak smell near the pipeline.
Illegal cutting of trees in the reserved forest area.
Public water tap running continuously, wasting water.
Dead fish floating in the lake.
Crack in the flyover pillar visible.
Pedestrian crossing signal not working.
Garbage burning near the school affecting air quality.
Open electrical box on the street level.
